N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7077.4 - Conditions and function

State Regulations
(a) Residential rehabilitation units shall be therapeutic and trauma-informed, and
aim to address individual treatment and rehabilitation needs and underlying
causes of problematic behaviors. (b) All residential rehabilitation units
shall create the least restrictive environment necessary for the safety of
incarcerated persons, staff, and the security of the facility. (c) No individual may be placed in a
residential rehabilitation unit based on the same act or incident that was
previously used as the basis for such placement. Notes
